full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal: Test Equipment and Altimeters

**Procurement Information**
=========================

* **Tender Reference:** PW-23-01028799
* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-23SL03/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-03
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-19T14:00:00 (UTC-04:00)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-03-29
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Danny Lebel
	+ Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

**Procurement Category**
=====================

* **Category:** GD (Goods and Services)
* **Subcategory:** SRVTGD (Repair and Overhaul of Test Equipment and Altimeters)

**Tender Description**
=====================

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the sustainment and delivery of Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE)/Search & Rescue – Aerial Delivery (SAR-AD) in-service support (ISS) and Repair and/or Overhaul (R&O) services for Test Equipment and Altimeters. This requirement is part of the Royal Canadian Air Force's (RCAF) worldwide operations.

**Security Requirements**
=====================

Security requirements are associated with this requirement. Please refer to Annex C - Security Requirement Check List and consult Part 6 - Security and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Basis of Payment**
==================

The labour rates for subcontracting must never be in excess of the rate in effect under the Basis of Payment.

**Language**
================

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments**
================

Attachments can be found at the following links:
	* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/03/b57f29edc0313a5fa2e58ff665594c40/23sl03zip_en.zip
	* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/29/cfd162e68569148eca324c95cde22556/w8485-23sl03_bid_soliciation_amd_001_en.pdf
